description: Schema for proxy server configuration file (and for config passed to proxy middleware)
title: Configuration

_88processResponse.description: defines how response from service is processed

anyOf.description: return only response body if status code is < 300, throw an exception otherwise
uses custom keyword 'typeof', function should return result or throw exception

$eref.description: defines how response from service is processed

anyOf.description: return only response body if status code is < 300, throw an exception otherwise
uses custom keyword 'typeof', function should return result or throw exception

___services.description: each property name will be an executor exposed to JSONScript interpreter
___services.title: proxied services

$eref.description: defines how response from service is processed

anyOf.description: return only response body if status code is < 300, throw an exception otherwise
uses custom keyword 'typeof', function should return result or throw exception

___Promise.description: Promise class to use, will be ignored if used from command line
